entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
